extDescription.message: LinkShield helps you recognize dangerous websites. Never share sensitive information with unknown websites.

alertMessage.message: This website contains a link to:

severityMediumRisk.message: Medium risk: this link may be unsafe. Be cautious.

adviceCheckUrl.message: Only open this link if you are sure it is safe. Carefully check the web address. Never log in if you are unsure whether the address is correct.

noHttps.message: This link does not use HTTPS (high risk). Your data can be easily stolen.

ipAsDomain.message: The website uses an IP address instead of a name (high risk). This could be a trick to mislead you.

tooManySubdomains.message: This web address contains many extra parts (high risk). This may indicate a fake site.

suspiciousKeywords.message: Suspicious words detected (medium risk). These may be words commonly used in scams.

suspiciousPattern.message: The web address looks suspicious (high risk). This may be a way to scam you.

shortenedUrl.message: This is a shortened link (high risk). You cannot see where the link really leads.

downloadPage.message: This page offers a suspicious download (high risk). It may contain harmful software.

freeHosting.message: This website uses free hosting (high risk). Such sites often have less security.

encodedCharacters.message: This web address contains many strange characters (high risk). This may be a way to hide something dangerous.

homoglyphAttack.message: This web address uses similar-looking characters (medium risk). This may be intended to mimic a real website.

metaRedirect.message: This website automatically redirects you (high risk). This may lead you to a dangerous site.

cryptoPhishing.message: This web address appears to be a crypto scam (high risk). Be careful not to lose money.

externalScripts.message: This website loads suspicious extra code (high risk). This may be dangerous.

suspiciousIframes.message: This website contains suspicious embedded windows (high risk). This may be used to mislead you.

suspiciousParams.message: This web address contains suspicious extra information (medium risk). This may be used to bypass security measures.

mixedContent.message: This page uses both secure and insecure elements (medium risk). This can weaken security.

unusualPort.message: This website uses an unusual port (high risk). This may bypass security measures.

javascriptScheme.message: This web address uses JavaScript (high risk). This may be used to execute harmful code.

urlFragmentTrick.message: This web address contains a suspicious fragment (medium risk). This may mislead you about where you really are.

suspiciousTLD.message: This web address uses a risky domain (high risk). Some domains are more commonly used for fraud.

base64OrHex.message: This web address contains encoded information (medium risk). This may be hiding something dangerous.

iframeHidden.message: This website uses a hidden frame (medium risk). This may be a way to hide something.

similarToLegitimateDomain.message: This web address closely resembles a well-known secure site (high risk). This may be a trick to mislead you.

popupSubtitle.message: Stay safe with warnings and protection.

backgroundAnalysisDescription.message: Block dangerous websites before you visit them.

activationRequired.message: Enable this feature first to use it.

integratedProtection.message: Built-in protection against phishing and malware

integratedProtectionDescription.message: This feature checks websites and links instantly.

premiumFeaturesActive.message: You are now using the premium version!

upgradePrompt.message: Upgrade to premium to get extra features.

bulkUrlCheckDescription.message: Upload a .txt file to check multiple links at once.

allowedProtocol.message: This link uses a secure protocol.

insecureLoginPage.message: This login page does not use HTTPS (high risk). Your data may be stolen.

invalidUrl.message: This web address is incorrect or mistyped.

loadingMessage.message: One moment, the system is performing checks...
